channel.title: {TUT} Commands ~Snake60025~
channel.description:
[move]~Snake60025~ basic commands[/move] Ok, I am am a new newb from theses forums. Mopar may rember me from kaitnieks becouse i love hes scripts but one got me banned. O well to get to the point. This are some basic commands! I thought people needed some since not have been posted.
Basic Commands [code] Sendkeyssilent= Sends the TEXT to the selected client sendkeys=Sends TEXT Repeat: Repeats the script also needed Until(false) Until(false): Needed with repeat to repeat the script wait(1000): Waits for the certain amount of time- Say 1000 is 1 second and etc bitmaps: Well cant tell ya much about them. [/code]
Il have to think of more later becosue my brain aitn complety working lol. :D Also if i have misspelled anything then sorry.

@kyle wrote:

… repeat is not always follwed by until(false) u could use until c>amountToMine also add that u can do wait(1000+random(300))
to make it random…

item.title: {TUT} Commands ~Snake60025~
item.dc:creator: @snake60025 snake60025
item.description:
@snake60025 wrote:

                                   [move]~Snake60025~ basic commands[/move]

Ok, I am am a new newb from theses forums. Mopar may rember me from kaitnieks becouse i love hes scripts but one got me banned. O well to get to the point. This are some basic commands! I thought people needed some since not have been posted.

Basic Commands

Sendkeyssilent= Sends the TEXT to the selected client
sendkeys=Sends TEXT
Repeat: Repeats the script also needed Until(false)
Until(false): Needed with repeat to repeat the script
wait(1000): Waits for the certain amount of time- Say 1000 is 1 second and etc
bitmaps: Well cant tell ya much about them.

Il have to think of more later becosue my brain aitn complety working lol.
Also if i have misspelled anything then sorry.

Read full topic
